backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, access control, Stripe checkout operations, bookings, and availability types with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific landing‑page copy update to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing component purpose and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode styling for global UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering all landing‑page sections inside an access‑code gate with error diagnostics and theme support.
frontend/src/components/AccessCodeGate.t: Manual access‑code gate requiring code entry and persisting unlock state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard showing bookings list and placeholder availability tab with role‑based access check.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityEdit: Empty component placeholder for availability management UI.
frontend/src/components/BookingSection.t: Empty component placeholder for booking flow UI.
frontend/src/components/BuildFailureDiag: Displays and manages build/deployment error details with copy and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/EthicsAndBoundar: Renders an informational ethics section explaining boundaries and disclaimers for sessions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with a tagline, decorative elements, and credits.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Fullscreen hero section with background imagery, title, and tagline animations.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Gates access behind an invite secret stored in URL/session and shows locked UI when absent.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a cancellation notice after failed payment with a link back home.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a success message and optional booking details parsed from URL params.
frontend/src/components/PractitionerAuth: Presents practitioner bio, image, experience, and social links.
frontend/src/components/PriceAndValue.ts: Shows session pricing and value explanation with supporting text.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToBookCTA.t: Call‑to‑action section directing users to an external booking link.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper providing section spacing, styling variants, and optional labels.
frontend/src/components/SessionStructure: React component rendering a four‑step session overview using SectionShell and styled content.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/WhatItIs.tsx: SectionShell component describing the purpose of The Clearing and listing what it is not.
frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx: Component outlining what happens during a session and when the work is most helpful, using structured text and separators.
frontend/src/components/WhoThisIsFor.tsx: Component detailing audiences for whom the service is or isn’t appropriate, split into two lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, Stripe config, checkout sessions, bookings, and admin checks using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and typography with custom gold shimmer animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/captureAppErrors.ts: Implements a global error capture utility that records errors, notifies listeners, and supports retrieval and clearing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing the DApp architecture, features, issues, and design notes for the booking and payment system.
